reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and well-made, with an amazing color that shows no signs of fading. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits amazingly, others report it barely fits over their head. Moreover, the size runs very small, and customers find it a little short and thick. Comfort is also mixed, with some finding it comfortable while others complain about the extremely itchy fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable
items.body: Adorable vest that feels very nice and not so scratchy Read more
items.author: Aleksey Gathers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute. Will be buying more in the future.
items.body: I got the green argyle sweater vest along with 3 other sweater vests for part of my back to school shopping. The quality of this sweater vest is great for the price. It's thick enough so it's not see through but not too thick to feel like you're being baked alive. It's also cute to wear with layers (like a turtleneck or long sleeved shirt underneath) or just by itself. I'm 5'6 and weigh 130lbs and I purchased a medium and it fits me well. The sweater vest also seems to hold up well in the washing machine. I've washed them a total of three times and there are no signs of color fading or any seams coming loose. (I just follow the washing instructions on the tag). Overall I recommend this product for people looking for a cute and quality sweater vest to add to their wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Evelyne houghton

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute runs big
items.body: Very soft, super cute. Definitely runs large. I'm a solid medium usually and am swimming in this sweater vest. It seems to be well made. Very stretchy. Read more
items.author: Tamara Tramelli

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get a size up
items.body: Delivered in mailbox Just what I ordered. 2nd order .1st order was medium but too small This is a large. Fits just right. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Awkward Shape
items.body: Loved the appearance and elasticity but, the comfort and versatility was not giving for me. It’s thick af and I live in FL hoping to go sleeveless but was STILL burning up. It’s a eh for me. Read more
items.author: James D Lyons

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not the size ordered
items.body: I cannot give any star, but in order to submit the review I have must a star. The product doesn't even deserve 1 star. The product I purchased was for a large 4 X. It was barely large enough for a child. It's an awful product. Read more
items.author: Teresa May Dennis

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink Green, Dark Blue Green, Orange Brown, Blue Multi, White Solid, Dusty Blue, Hot Pink White, Beige and Pink, Mint Green, Houndstooth Brown, Coffe Brown White, Grey and Black, Black Beige, Orange Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
